creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: eight total lines; five full lines of calligraphy; three shorter lines at L with smaller characters; oval intaglio stamp URC; square intaglio stamp LLC, square relief stamp LLC
markings: URC, oval intaglio seal; LLC, square intaglio seal; LLC, square relief seal; on back, ULC, in pencil: [Shunkin]
title: Poem in Chinese Style
